unnormalised: I remember struggling during my MBBS days at AIIMS, Delhi. It was tough! I tried a mental health app after watching "Dear Zindagi," you know, the SRK one? It helped me track my mood and practice some calming breathing exercises. It wasn't a cure-all, but a small step in the right direction. Getting chai with friends at Dilli Haat helped too!
normalised: I remember struggling during my M B B S days at A I I M S, Delhi. It was tough! I tried a mental health app after watching "Dear Zindagi," you know, the S R K one? It helped me track my mood and practice some calming breathing exercises. It wasn't a cure-all, but a small step in the right direction. Getting chai with friends at Dilli Haat helped too!
